clauses.title: Parties
clauses.summary: Identifies the parties involved in the lease agreement, including the landlord and tenant.
clauses.original_text: 1. PARTIES. This Residential Lease Agreement (“Agreement”) made this ___________ is between: Landlord Name: ____________________________________________ with a mailing address of: _________________________________________________ (“Landlord”), AND Tenant Name(s): ____________________________________________ (“Tenant(s)”). Landlord and Tenant are each collectively referred to as the "Parties."

clauses.title: Property
clauses.summary: Describes the property being leased, including its address and type.
clauses.original_text: 2. PROPERTY. The Landlord agrees to lease the described property to the Tenant: Address: ______________________________________________________ (“Premises”). Residence Type: ☐ Single-family ☐ Apartment ☐ Condominium ☐ Other: ____________

clauses.title: Term
clauses.summary: Specifies the start and end dates of the lease term.
clauses.original_text: 3. TERM. The Agreement shall begin on _________________ and end on _________________ (“Term”).

clauses.title: Rent
clauses.summary: Details the amount of rent, payment frequency, and due date.
obligations: Pay rent in equal monthly installments.
Ensure rent is paid by the specified due date.
risks: Late payments may result in penalties or eviction.
clauses.original_text: 4. RENT. The Tenant shall pay the Landlord in equal monthly installments of $___________ (“Rent”). The Rent shall be due on the ____ of every month and paid under the following instructions: ____________________________________________________________________________.

clauses.title: Security Deposit
clauses.summary: Outlines the security deposit requirements, including the amount and return conditions.
obligations: Deposit the specified amount as security.
Allow deductions for damages upon move-out.
risks: Deposit may be withheld for damages beyond normal wear and tear.
clauses.original_text: 5. SECURITY DEPOSIT. The Tenant (check one): ☐ Shall deposit with the Landlord the sum of $___________ as security for any damage caused to the Premises during the Term. Such deposit shall be returned to the Tenant, less any itemized deductions, within ______ days after the end of the Term. ☐ Shall NOT be required to pay a security deposit.
